name: Lucky Lefty Loves Loops - Post Jam
name_original: Lucky Lefty Loves Loops - Post Jam
description:
Lucky Lefty Lo❤️es Loops! The luminous life that a leftward leaning snail leads likens to a long lost love that you never knew you left.  Play as Lucky Lefty as you uncover the meaning of the universe! 🤯

Navigate your way through the loops. Watch out for Rude Righties getting in your way for not fitting in. Try to get a personal best lap time and compare with friends! Can you beat my high score of 33.13? Don't forget to find out what's at the end of the loop!

WASD or arrow keys for movement

R to restart lap

Q to go back to previous screen

Game by: TheBookSnail

Snail art and animation by: ElysiaGriffin


Patch Notes of latest version:

  • Can now use full screen on itch without breaking game
  • Audio settings now save when exiting
  • Fix to snail draw order so Righties are consistent 
  • Fixed a high score rounding error
  • Always shows 2 decimal places
  • Can now reset (R) or quit (Q) during zoom transition
  • Better messaging to player they can move on title screen
